thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Kozan Yahi

author: Kozan Yahi
title: Kozan Yahi
text: Ordered flowers for valentines for my partner in switzerland - used floraqueen year before for 12 red roses and came and was perfect.this year i ordered red roses again and the flowers were dead on arrival.shocking,waste if money,quality poor and no sympathy or apologies from floraqueen.wouldnt use them ever again! Order flowers at your own peril and prepar to be disappointed
